ygData.msgSnippet: ... WindRider sensed Battera come up behind him. He laughed, Think you re pretty fast, huh? He sensed something about her, a certain gentleness deep within

From: Terry Barlow <twb176@...>

::WindRider::
WindRider sensed Battera come up behind him. He
laughed, "Think you're pretty fast, huh?" He sensed
something about her, a certain gentleness deep within
her spark. It definitely had him interested. He sped
up and flew towards the entrance.
--- logomorph@... wrote:
> ::Battera::
> 
> She transformed into bat mode and flew down the hall
> after him.  She 
> smiled, this was the first time she had had fun
> while being on the 
> ship.  She beat her wings and came up just behind
> him.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > ::WindRider::
> > Battera's response made him very happy. He looked
> at
> > Battera and said to her playfully, "Race ya!!"
> With
> > that he transformed to beast mode (a condor) and
> flew
> > down the hallway.
> 
> 
>
